channel.title: OpenAI News (Enriched)
channel.description: Latest news from OpenAI with full article content.

item.title: EMEA Youth & Wellbeing Grant
item.description: Apply for the EMEA Youth & Wellbeing Grant, a €500,000 program funding NGOs and researchers advancing youth safety and wellbeing in the age of AI.

item.title: The next chapter for AI in the EU
item.description: OpenAI launches the EU Economic Blueprint 2.0 with new data, partnerships, and initiatives to accelerate AI adoption, skills, and growth across Europe.

item.title: PVH reimagines the future of fashion with OpenAI
item.description: PVH Corp., parent company of Calvin Klein and Tommy Hilfiger, is adopting ChatGPT Enterprise to bring AI into fashion design, supply chain, and consumer engagement.

item.title: Powering tax donations with AI powered personalized recommendations
item.description: TRUSTBANK partnered with Recursive to build Choice AI using OpenAI models, delivering personalized, conversational recommendations that simplify Furusato Nozei gift discovery. A multi-agent system helps donors navigate thousands of options and find gifts that match their preferences.

item.title: Introducing Prism
item.description: Prism is a free LaTeX-native workspace with GPT-5.2 built in, helping researchers write, collaborate, and reason in one place.

item.title: How Indeed uses AI to help evolve the job search
item.description: Indeed’s CRO Maggie Hulce shares how AI is transforming job search, recruiting, and talent acquisition for employers and job seekers.

item.title: Unrolling the Codex agent loop
item.description: A technical deep dive into the Codex agent loop, explaining how Codex CLI orchestrates models, tools, prompts, and performance using the Responses API.

item.title: Scaling PostgreSQL to power 800 million ChatGPT users
item.description: An inside look at how OpenAI scaled PostgreSQL to millions of queries per second using replicas, caching, rate limiting, and workload isolation.

item.title: Inside Praktika's conversational approach to language learning
item.description: How Praktika uses GPT-4.1 and GPT-5.2 to build adaptive AI tutors that personalize lessons, track progress, and help learners achieve real-world language fluency

item.title: Inside GPT-5 for Work: How Businesses Use GPT-5
item.description: A data-driven report on how workers across industries use ChatGPT—covering adoption trends, top tasks, departmental patterns, and the future of AI at work.

item.title: How Higgsfield turns simple ideas into cinematic social videos
item.description: Discover how Higgsfield gives creators cinematic, social-first video output from simple inputs using OpenAI GPT-4.1, GPT-5, and Sora 2.

item.title: Introducing Edu for Countries
item.description: Edu for Countries is a new OpenAI initiative helping governments use AI to modernize education systems and build future-ready workforces.

item.title: How countries can end the capability overhang
item.description: Our latest report reveals stark differences in advanced AI adoption across countries and outlines new initiatives to help nations capture productivity gains from AI.

item.title: Horizon 1000: Advancing AI for primary healthcare
item.description: OpenAI and the Gates Foundation launch Horizon 1000, a $50M pilot advancing AI capabilities for healthcare in Africa. The initiative aims to reach 1,000 clinics by 2028.

item.title: Stargate Community
item.description: Stargate Community plans detail a community-first approach to AI infrastructure, using locally tailored plans shaped by community input, energy needs, and workforce priorities.

item.title: Cisco and OpenAI redefine enterprise engineering with AI agents
item.description: Cisco and OpenAI redefine enterprise engineering with Codex, an AI software agent embedded in workflows to speed builds, automate defect fixes, and enable AI-native development.

item.title: ServiceNow powers actionable enterprise AI with OpenAI
item.description: ServiceNow expands access to OpenAI frontier models to power AI-driven enterprise workflows, summarization, search, and voice across the ServiceNow Platform.

item.title: Our approach to age prediction
item.description: ChatGPT is rolling out age prediction to estimate if accounts are under or over 18, applying safeguards for teens and refining accuracy over time.

item.title: AI for self empowerment
item.description: How AI can expand human agency by closing the capability overhang—helping people, businesses, and countries unlock real productivity, growth, and opportunity.

item.title: A business that scales with the value of intelligence
item.description: OpenAI’s business model scales with intelligence—spanning subscriptions, API, ads, commerce, and compute—driven by deepening ChatGPT adoption.

item.title: The truth left out from Elon Musk’s recent court filing
item.description: The truth left out from Elon Musk’s recent court filing.

item.title: Our approach to advertising and expanding access to ChatGPT
item.description: OpenAI plans to test advertising in the U.S. for ChatGPT’s free and Go tiers to expand affordable access to AI worldwide, while protecting privacy, trust, and answer quality.

item.title: Introducing ChatGPT Go, now available worldwide
item.description: ChatGPT Go is now available worldwide, offering expanded access to GPT-5.2 Instant, higher usage limits, and longer memory—making advanced AI more affordable globally.

item.title: Investing in Merge Labs
item.description: OpenAI is investing in Merge Labs to support new brain computer interfaces that bridge biological and artificial intelligence to maximize human ability, agency, and experience.

item.title: Strengthening the U.S. AI supply chain through domestic manufacturing
item.description: OpenAI launches a new RFP to strengthen the U.S. AI supply chain by accelerating domestic manufacturing, creating jobs, and scaling AI infrastructure.

item.title: OpenAI partners with Cerebras
item.description: OpenAI partners with Cerebras to add 750MW of high-speed AI compute, reducing inference latency and making ChatGPT faster for real-time AI workloads.

item.title: Zenken boosts a lean sales team with ChatGPT Enterprise
item.description: By rolling out ChatGPT Enterprise company-wide, Zenken has boosted sales performance, cut preparation time, and increased proposal success rates. AI-supported workflows are helping a lean team deliver more personalized, effective customer engagement.

item.title: OpenAI’s Raising Concerns Policy
item.description: We’re publishing our Raising Concerns Policy, which protects employees’ rights to make protected disclosures.

item.title: OpenAI and SoftBank Group partner with SB Energy
item.description: OpenAI and SoftBank Group partner with SB Energy to develop multi-gigawatt AI data center campuses, including a 1.2 GW Texas facility supporting the Stargate initiative.

item.title: Datadog uses Codex for system-level code review
item.description: OpenAI and Datadog brand graphic with the OpenAI wordmark on the left, the Datadog logo on the right, and a central abstract brown fur-like texture panel on a white background.
